text: Sir James Richard Marie Mancham (11 August 1939 - 8 January 2017) was a Seychellois politician. He was the first President of Seychelles from 1976 to 1977. He was born in Victoria. He was also Prime Minister of Seychelles from 1975 to 1976. Mancham died from a possible stroke on 8 January 2017 at his home in Glacis. He was 77. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Presidents of Seychelles Category:Prime Ministers of Seychelles Category:Knights Commander of the Order of the British Empire
title: James Mancham
